import*as actionTypes from'./ActionTypes';// Create Restaurant Actions
export var createRestaurantRequest=function createRestaurantRequest(){return{type:actionTypes.CREATE_RESTAURANT_REQUEST};};export var createRestaurantSuccess=function createRestaurantSuccess(restaurant){return{type:actionTypes.CREATE_RESTAURANT_SUCCESS,payload:restaurant};};export var createRestaurantFailure=function createRestaurantFailure(error){return{type:actionTypes.CREATE_RESTAURANT_FAILURE,payload:error};};// Get All Restaurants Actions (similar structure for other actions)
export var getAllRestaurantsRequest=function getAllRestaurantsRequest(){return{type:actionTypes.GET_ALL_RESTAURANTS_REQUEST};};export var getAllRestaurantsSuccess=function getAllRestaurantsSuccess(restaurants){return{type:actionTypes.GET_ALL_RESTAURANTS_SUCCESS,payload:restaurants};};export var getAllRestaurantsFailure=function getAllRestaurantsFailure(error){return{type:actionTypes.GET_ALL_RESTAURANTS_FAILURE,payload:error};};// Delete Restaurant Actions
export var deleteRestaurantRequest=function deleteRestaurantRequest(){return{type:actionTypes.DELETE_RESTAURANT_REQUEST};};export var deleteRestaurantSuccess=function deleteRestaurantSuccess(restaurantId){return{type:actionTypes.DELETE_RESTAURANT_SUCCESS,payload:restaurantId};};export var deleteRestaurantFailure=function deleteRestaurantFailure(error){return{type:actionTypes.DELETE_RESTAURANT_FAILURE,payload:error};};// Update Restaurant Actions
export var updateRestaurantRequest=function updateRestaurantRequest(){return{type:actionTypes.UPDATE_RESTAURANT_REQUEST};};export var updateRestaurantSuccess=function updateRestaurantSuccess(updatedRestaurant){return{type:actionTypes.UPDATE_RESTAURANT_SUCCESS,payload:updatedRestaurant};};export var updateRestaurantFailure=function updateRestaurantFailure(error){return{type:actionTypes.UPDATE_RESTAURANT_FAILURE,payload:error};};export var getRestaurantByIdRequest=function getRestaurantByIdRequest(){return{type:actionTypes.GET_RESTAURANT_BY_ID_REQUEST};};export var getRestaurantByIdSuccess=function getRestaurantByIdSuccess(restaurant){return{type:actionTypes.GET_RESTAURANT_BY_ID_SUCCESS,payload:restaurant};};export var getRestaurantByIdFailure=function getRestaurantByIdFailure(error){return{type:actionTypes.GET_RESTAURANT_BY_ID_FAILURE,payload:error};};
